channel.title: VANTAGE PK - Skilling - Bossing - Pking
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/293vyo2.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]Why Vantage PK?[/b][/center]
[center]Our Mission at Vantage PK was to create a PK server that is not another carbon copy PK Server like nearly every pk based server in existence. At Vantage PK we provide you with a unique pking experience like no other! The only question is, are you ready?[/center]
[center][b]Links![/b] Home. [url=http://vantage-pk.info/]http://vantage-pk.info/[/url]
Play Now! [url=http://vantage-pk.info/index.php/pages/play.php]http://vantage-pk.info/index.php/pages/play.php[/url][/center]
[center][b]Features:[/b]
- Flawless Switching - Flawless Combat - Duel Arena -> Dupe Free! - 100% Uptime - Boss Points - Custom Skilling Area -> All Skills 100% - Active Pure and Main PKing - Log in and PK - Custom Shops -> Reasonable prices - PK Shop - Pest Control - Barrows - Unique Bosses -> Some located in Wildness/Safe zones[/center]
[center]Pictures.[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/30a3uva.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/14snjvc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/wuhu01.png[/img][/center]
